channel.title: Dragon Fire
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make dragons breath fire? I added a dragon that wasnt in npc.cfg and after editing it to correct attack anim and everything, it still wont shoot fire. Any ideas?

item.title: Dragon Fire
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

you have to actually send the frame that trajectory spells use, but use the ID of the fire and make the npc cast it at the player

Read full topic
